subject: Rock Climbing
Parachutes and Parachute Jumping
Parks and Other Recreation Areas
lead_paragraph: Dean Potter, one of the world’s top climbers, has been trying for weeks to cross the Hell Roaring Canyon on a rope with no tether 900 feet above a dry riverbed in Utah.
snippet: Dean Potter, one of the world’s top climbers, has been trying for weeks to cross the Hell Roaring Canyon on a rope with no tether 900 feet above a dry riverbed in Utah.
